title: European Council summit: Live blog
text:
EU leaders meet in Brussels on Thursday and Friday, and there's a lot to talk about: Brexit, enlargement, Turkey, climate change, the EU's long-term budget and the bloc's priorities for 2019-2024.

Scroll down for updates.

**A message from AVAAZ: Right now, hundreds of thousands are signing a call on EU leaders to urgently suspend all weapons exports to Turkey — including those planned under existing deals. It's time for EU leaders to do everything they can to bring all parties to the table for peace talks and an immediate ceasefire.**
description: Brexit, enlargement, Turkey, climate change and the EU’s next long-term budget all on the agenda.
